description:
Did you know that several TV advertisements/commercials are created using PowerPoint special effects? Here is your opportunity to learn a few tricks. To learn the basic techniques and develop your PowerPoint skills and start creating PowerPoint presentations with special effects just like the pros, you will be creating a Fireworks Explosion Project. Creating the colorful fireworks explosion involves skillfully combining shapes with entrance and exit animation effects. You will be guided with step-by-step easy to follow instructions to develop your skills.

The course is divided into nine sections:

Section One: Introduction

  • Watch the magic happen
